contentencoded: As President Obama prepares for a day-long Inauguration celebration, we'll look at the prospects for education in America, and our opportunities going forward. A few months ago, we teamed up with a group of journalism students at the University of Southern California's Annenberg School. Using social media, we tracked down people who were born on past Inauguration Days. This is what they had to say about how America has changed, and where we are now.
teaser: Reflecting on what it's like to be born on Inauguration Day, and how America has changed over time.
title: Born on Inauguration Day: How America has changed
description: Reflecting on what it's like to be born on Inauguration Day, and how America has changed over time.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, January 21, 2013
contenttemplated:
